message.content: This question requires basic knowledge about weather patterns. When grey clouds appear, it often indicates that precipitation is imminent. In this case, the most likely direct follow-up to grey clouds would be sleet, which is a type of icy precipitation. Option (A) is incorrect as UFOs are not directly related to weather phenomena. Option (B) is possible as planes can fly through or near grey clouds, but it is not the most direct follow-up. Option (D) is unrelated as tsunamis are not associated with clouds or weather patterns.

Option (B) is possible, as planes can fly through grey clouds, but it does not directly follow the appearance of the clouds. Option (D) is unrelated to weather and refers to a large ocean wave triggered by underwater earthquakes.
